document_data.name: ''The Siren's Yearning''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Siren's Yearning''''' was a powerful song that became imbued with [[magic]] if performed by a [[bard]].
document_data.Content: When played, the song affected the performer's opponents in a similar way as a [[siren]]'s ''[[charm]]''. Those who succumbed to the song's magics remained enthralled for ten minutes or until they suffered harm.
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1281}}, ''The Siren's Yearning'' was in the repertoire of some of the most experienced bards. It was heard being performed in the [[Ten-Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]] and the village of [[Kuldahar]].
